channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023070127
item.description:
Report X-2023070127

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leakage from package was noticed when package was loaded onto outbound trailer. DescribePack: Bottom of 4 L glass bottle shattered. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Quickly transported package in hazmat spill container to fume hood. Placed absorbent pads to soak up spill.

item.title: Report X-2023061710
item.description:
Report X-2023061710

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damaged package arrived into station during AM presort leaking, damaging several surrounding packages. DescribePack: 1 of 4 Metal gallon cans leaking from top, lid popped off due to dent in sidewall. All contents leaked out. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Manager loaded damaged hazmat into red hazmat bin and notified QA immediately

item.title: Report E-2023070071
item.description:
Report E-2023070071

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-08
  • City: NORTHBOROUGH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While loading a pallet of freight into a trailer the forklift operator did not realize the forkblades from his forklift were protruding from the pallet he was carrying and as a result when he went to put the pallet down the forkblades punctured a box on a pallet already staged in the trailer. As a result the forkblade punctured to enclosed 1 gallon containers that were in the boc consequently contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured containers.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unknown, possibly dropped. DescribePack: Top cover of bucket was pulled up causing some to leak out. From there the powder leaked out of the cardboard box seams. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Neutralized and contained. Neutralized material disposed of.
